SatanParlor:ablockalypse.NAME: Ablockalypse!
SatanParlor:ablockalypse.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 3 Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

SatanParlor:blades.NAME: Blades of Chaos
SatanParlor:blades.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! Vengeance. NL Exhaust.

SatanParlor:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
SatanParlor:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

SatanParlor:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
SatanParlor:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
SatanParlor:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

SatanParlor:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
SatanParlor:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

SatanParlor:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
SatanParlor:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !SatanParlor:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

SatanParlor:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
SatanParlor:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !SatanParlor:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

SatanParlor:rattle.NAME: Rattle
SatanParlor:rattle.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, remove 1 Strength or apply Weak to a random enemy.
SatanParlor:rattle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, remove 1 Strength or apply Weak to ALL enemies.

SatanParlor:conjuresoul.NAME: Conjure Soul
SatanParlor:conjuresoul.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, heal 3 and lose 2 Dexterity.
SatanParlor:conjuresoul.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, heal 3 and lose 1 Dexterity.

SatanParlor:styx.NAME: Styx Cleanse
SatanParlor:styx.DESCRIPTION: Lose X max HP, gain X Intangible. NL Exhaust.
SatanParlor:styx.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose X max HP, gain X Intangible.

SatanParlor:cyclone.NAME: Cyclone of Chaos
SatanParlor:cyclone.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain 1 Vengeance.

SatanParlor:tartarusrage.NAME: Tartarus Rage
SatanParlor:tartarusrage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! for each stack of Vengeance. NL (Deals !D! x !M!)

SatanParlor:settle.NAME: Settle
SatanParlor:settle.DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 Vengeance. Gain 2 Energy. NL Exhaust.

SatanParlor:kBerserk.NAME: Berserk
SatanParlor:kBerserk.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Vulnerable. At the start of your turn, gain [R].
